column4: Is there anyone here who can help me with a strange problem with my nvidia drivers? everything seems fine, the drivers, the xorg output, and all. but gl stuff uses 100% cpu.
did u use envy to install the drivers?
I used synaptics and chose the never drivers

I installed envyng-gtk now, will check it out
